game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the game logic for poker.
    Author:
    Stefan Fuchs, Jan-Niklas Wortmann
    See Also:
    JSONArray, JSONObject, ArrayList, List

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void dealBoardCards()
      draws cards every round to the board (table) burns a card before every draw if zero cards on the table draw 3 if there are three cards on the table draw 1 if there are four cards on the table draw 1 and set last round sends a push notification to all players with the board cards
      private void dealCards()
      gives every player two cards from the CardStack
      boolean doBet(User player, int bet)
      does a bet for the given User add the bet to the pod sets the last action that was made to a bet sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
      boolean doCall(User player)
      does a call for the given User add the amount of the last bet to the pod sets the last action that was made to a call sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
      boolean doCheck(User player)
      does a check for the given User is only possible if the action before was a check or he is the first player sets the last action that was made to a check sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
      boolean doFold(User player)
      does a fold for the given User his last action is set to fold
      boolean doRaise(User player, int raise)
      does a raise for the given User.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(UserList players)
        creates a new instance of Game initialized with the given Players
        Parameters:
        players - a UserList of the Players who are playing in the Game

    • Method Detail

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(User player)
        lets a User join the game. He is added to the list of playing Users in this Game
        Parameters:
        player - the joining User

      • leaveGame

        public void leaveGame(User player)
        removes the given User from the list of playing Users
        Parameters:
        player - the User to be removed

      • getActive_players

        public UserList getActive_players()

      • startRound

        public void startRound(User player)
        lets the Game start. Only possible if there are two or more Players

      • doRaise

        public boolean doRaise(User player,
                       int raise)
        does a raise for the given User. adds the raise to the pod sets the last action that was made to an raise sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is doing the raise
        raise - the amount of the raise

      • doBet

        public boolean doBet(User player,
                     int bet)
        does a bet for the given User add the bet to the pod sets the last action that was made to a bet sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is doing the bet
        bet - the amount of the bet

      • doCall

        public boolean doCall(User player)
        does a call for the given User add the amount of the last bet to the pod sets the last action that was made to a call sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is doing the call

      • doCheck

        public boolean doCheck(User player)
        does a check for the given User is only possible if the action before was a check or he is the first player sets the last action that was made to a check sets the next player who needs to trigger an action
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is doing the check

      • doFold

        public boolean doFold(User player)
        does a fold for the given User his last action is set to fold
        Parameters:
        player - the player who is doing the fold

      • setLastActions

        private void setLastActions(java.lang.String method,
                            User player)

      • isCurrent

        private boolean isCurrent(User player)
        checks if the given User is the current User so he can perform an Action
        Parameters:
        player - the player to check if he is the current player
        Returns:
        returns TRUE if he is the current player, FALSE otherwise

      • getLastBet

        private int getLastBet()
        returns the last bet that was made
        Returns:
        returns the value of the last bet (Integer)

      • setNextUser

        private void setNextUser(User current_player,
                         int user_index)
        sets the next user who needs to perform an Action. if the next player has folded, the user after him will get next user checks if the next player is the "first" of a round, so the round ends if it is the last turn (full table) the game ends
        Parameters:
        current_player - the current player who did the last action

      • setBlindPlayers

        private void setBlindPlayers()
        sets the small and the big blind of this round sets the lastAction of the small and big blind user

      • initRound

        private void initRound()
        initializes a new Round. creates an empty pod, a new CardStack and gives every player two cards. also sets small and big blind. sets the player who does his first action

      • pushGameDataToUsers

        private void pushGameDataToUsers(java.lang.String event,
                                 boolean show_player_cards)
        Sends a jsonobject to all players. This notification contains the relevant data for the game.
        Parameters:
        event - The event for the push notification
        show_player_cards - a boolean if the player cards have to be shown or not
        See Also:
        getJsonGameFrame(User, boolean), Pusher.pushToSingle(String, JSONObject, Session)

      • getJsonGameFrame

        private org.json.JSONObject getJsonGameFrame(User user,
                                             boolean show_player_cards)
        This method returns a JSONObject which is needed for all game push notification. This JSONObject contains the keys:
        • cards Type: JSONArray
          • value Type: String
          • symbol Type: String
        • your_turn Type: Boolean
        • your_money Type: Int
        • call_value Type: Int
        • is_running Type: Boolean
        • all_users Type: JSONArray
          • username Type: String
          • is_big_blind Type: Boolean
          • is_small_blind Type: Boolean
          • is_active Type: Boolean
          • show_cards Type: Boolean
          • hand_cards Type: JSONArray
        Parameters:
        user - a User object to get access to his hand cards, his limit etc.
        show_player_cards - a boolean to decide if the hand cards have to be shown or not.
        Returns:
        descriped above

      • getAvailableMethods

        private org.json.JSONObject getAvailableMethods(User user)

      • isFirstPlayer

        private boolean isFirstPlayer(User user)
        A method to say if a user is the first player
        Parameters:
        user - to check up
        Returns:
        true when first player else false

      • dealCards

        private void dealCards()
        gives every player two cards from the CardStack

      • dealBoardCards

        private void dealBoardCards()
        draws cards every round to the board (table) burns a card before every draw if zero cards on the table draw 3 if there are three cards on the table draw 1 if there are four cards on the table draw 1 and set last round sends a push notification to all players with the board cards

      • getPodValue

        private int getPodValue()
        returns the value of the pod
        Returns:
        returns the value of the pod (Integer)

      • raiseBlindIndex

        private int raiseBlindIndex()
        increase the blind index to the index of the next small blind
        Returns:
        the blind index

      • lastActionEquals

        private boolean lastActionEquals(java.lang.String action)
        Check if the last element of the lastActions list is equal to the action given as parameter
        Parameters:
        action - to be checked up
        Returns:
        true when the last element of lastAction is equal to the given action else false
